name: Man, I Love Fishing!
description:
Relax. Drop your worries, stress, and everything you've got going on in life. Pick up that tackle box and step into the pleasant lagoons and shores of Man, I Love Fishing! With many kinds of fish to catch, three different areas, and a boat to sail the seas as you see fit, the world is your oyster in this game!

Credits:

Ashton Lively - Programmer, System Designer

Audrey Blair - UI / UX Designer

Connor Dunn- 3D Modeler, Lead Artist

Haley Nelson- Producer, Level Designer

Jake Weber- Sound Designer
